Answers: A novel coronavirus is a new coronavirus that has not been previously identified.
COVID-19 is the disease caused by the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2.

Questions: What are the symptoms of COVID-19?
Answers: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and difficulty breathing.
COVID-19 spreads mainly through respiratory droplets when an infected person coughs or sneezes.

Questions: How can I protect myself from COVID-19?
Answers: Wash hands frequently, wear a mask, practice social distancing, and get vaccinated.
